preqs: MGX5985, MGX9850 or seek Chief Examiner's approval before undertaking this unit.

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {MGF5985, MGX5985, MGX9850} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS}
Unit was previously coded {MAN5631, MBA6450, MBA6450A, MBA645S, MGF5631, MGF9630, MGX5631}

description: This unit advances prior learning in the fields of international management and human resource management. The specific area of inquiry in international human resource management is the personnel function in the increasingly diverse and complex environment of internationalisation. Based on the premise that people are a source of competitive advantage for international organisations, this unit analyses the environment, role and function of international HRM.
